titleInfo.title: Thos. Hughes in New York City to O.P. Temple in Knoxville, Tennessee

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

subject.topic: Boyle, John; Board of Aid to Land Ownership, Limited; Knoxville Chronicle; Colonel Killdrew; Smith, F.

mods.note: Hughes expresses his gratitude for Temple`s letter and extracts from local paper; especial thanks for Temple`s letter in Knoxville Chronicle; never has spoken unkindly of native neighbors; hope for native uplift; encloses a pamphlet on Rugby; inquires if Temple will aid in its preparation; states there is much interest in England; and he hopes for many settlers to colonize Rugby in the Spring.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
